column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Came to Chicago for the first time and decided to choose this place to try a good steakhouse and didn't disappoint this was probably one of the best steakhouse I been too got the dry aged ribeye omg delicious server was very attendant brought my own wine bottle and don't charge u for that just got to give a guest a glass which I didn't mind I told him to choose the person that deserve it but if u craving steak and want a good place for dinner come here and get the dry aged ribeye
